name: JK Singles 11 - Betrayal & Disappearance of Guntur Prabu Utama
summary:
Made with Love, Passion, Lies, Betrayal, and Pain?
Funkot Import Recordings presents
11th Funkot Compilation (Indonesian Funky House Music)
Focused in Hard instrumental style
Quality Tracks for DJ use & Easy Listening
*All Tracks Made In Indonesia*

愛、情熱、嘘、裏切り、苦しみで作られたFunkotコンピレーションをお届けします！
info:
• 厂牌: Funkot Import Recordings
  • 制作: Joe.K
  • 艺术家: Lil 涙
  • 作曲: Agas、Alvian、Apin17、DM、DeaLy、Gugun、N.S.PUTRA、NdeYoga、Nicho、Ricko
  • 发售日期: 2021-04-25 (M3-47)
  • 特设: https://jkcd0029.tumblr.com/
  • 碟片数量: 1

disc.title: 11 Hey, Mr. DJ, I Thought You Said We Had A Deal
